INGREDIENTS:
• 3 eggs
• 50ml milk
• Salt, pepper
• Butter

STEPS:
1. Beat eggs with milk
2. Add salt and pepper
3. Fry in butter
4. Serve hot

INGREDIENTS:
• 500g beef
• 3 beets
• 2 carrots
• 1 onion
• Cabbage
• Tomato paste

STEPS:
1. Cook broth
2. Fry vegetables
3. Add cabbage
4. Cook until ready
5. Serve with sour cream

INGREDIENTS:
• 400g pasta
• 200g bacon
• 3 eggs
• Parmesan cheese
• Black pepper

STEPS:
1. Cook pasta
2. Fry bacon
3. Mix eggs with cheese
4. Combine all
5. Add pepper and serve
